DANIELE VENTURI About Me As of April 2022, I am a Full Professor at the Computer Science Department of Sapienza University of Rome, Italy. My main area of interest is theoretical cryptography. Some of the topics I have worked on include: leakage and tamper resilience secret handshakes multiparty computation and cloud security zero knowledge abstract and constructive cryptography Contact Email: (lastname)_at_di.uniroma1.it Phone: (+39)06-49255165 Office: Office #G29, Viale Regina Elena 295 (2nd Floor), 00161, Rome (RM), Italy (directions) © 2010 Daniele Venturi Design: COSIC Webteam | Content: Daniele Venturi Last modified on 21/04/2016 17:30 Thanks for visiting :-)
